abilities.name: ATTACK
abilities.desc: A basic attack that deals (100%) Physical Damage.

abilities.name: DOUBLE_STRIKE
abilities.desc: Attack your taget two times, dealing (80%) Physical Damage on each succefful hit.

abilities.name: FIREBALL
abilities.desc:
Throw a fireball on an target that deals (180%) Magical Damage.
 | Effect: also set fire to your target dealing (10%) Magical Damage for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: BRUTAL_STRIKE
abilities.desc:
Brutally charges the target dealing (220%) Physical Damage.
 | Effect: has 10% chance of cause Bleed, which deals 5% of damage dealt as Physical Damage for 5 rounds.
